Reviews.Title: “Visited Amsterdam and the Jupiter Hotel in April 2012”
Reviews.Author: Ian D Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel definately value money clean selection continental breakfast situated quiet city excellent tram links stayed fourth floor using shared bathroom cleaned regular basis shower easy return amsterdam hope definately book criticism teacoffee facilities

Reviews.Title: “Stay for two nights”
Reviews.Author: Bogdan D Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotel nights location nice reach reasonable times staircases deliberately steep climb reach breakfast eat sandwiches cookies drink juice milk coffee stay hotel hear happens closest usually reception anyway ratio qualityprice quality low price

Reviews.Title: “clean but a few issues”
Reviews.Author: karen g
Reviews.Content: clean receptionist helpful smoking bit pain receptionist ground floor easy access smoke found staff rude obnoxious tram 4 mins nearest coffee shop valuables secure found perfect couple breakfast finished 10am feel bit clean secure staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for a family City Break.”
Reviews.Author: 888Claire
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect short family city break family spotlessly clean ensuite bathroom looked brand hotel staff bad press helpful pleasant informative breakfast plentiful adequate hotel ideal location numerous bars restaurants mere 5 minutes walk city centre 5 mins walk overall recommend

Reviews.Title: “There must be better hotels in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Del419
Reviews.Content: clean ensuite bathroom looked refurbishment quality fittings breakfast ok special adequate location near leidseplein owner incredibly rude idea constitutes customer service night settle twin despite booking double day left easiest anne frank house replied havent paid wasnt checking tomorrow shouldve paid checked told payment checkin offered credit card confirmation acceptable hotel shoved saying cash didnt 390 euros cash explained hed wait fortunately found atm pay cash useless pillow person pillows unsurprisingly didnt checking owner grilled whereabouts tv remote control wed left found 130 euros night id expect owner civil

Reviews.Title: “Nice and quiet”
Reviews.Author: leitandi
Reviews.Content: family maybe adequate bright warmthe bathroom fine plenty drawers stuff breakfast yes elevator tiny hallways narrow netherlands location 5 minutes walk leidsplein public transportation easy neighbourhood fairly quiet ambulances police cars unusually loud smell bathroom despite staffs effort bad left

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful surprise”
Reviews.Author: DMarchesi
Reviews.Content: picked hotel price internet pictures owner couldnt help husband wallet stollen tram hotel cash gone owner check banks closed day cash told nearest bank located referral local restaurant street answered questions restaurants sites local habits etc day included breakfast consisted hard boiled eggs cold cereals fruit cheeses meats breads juices milk coffee variety days stayed bed bathroom snug clean owners personality guarded cold talked loosened definitely return hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, will stay here again on our next viisit”
Reviews.Author: sharonscottishlass
Reviews.Content: hotel 15 mins walk dam square makes slightly cheaper hotel clean breakfast usual dutch continental quiet areajust minutes walk leidseplein square cant happy hotel staff

Reviews.Title: “Good value, Clean, Great Location”
Reviews.Author: randomadvisor
Reviews.Content: please ignore bad reviews hotel stayed twice am stay clean beds comfy location superb staff helpful friendly occasions breakfast included selection cold meats cakes nice value money overall hotel free wifi visit en suite shower overall recommend hotel compared horror storys closer central station hotel nice peaceful location

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: irishbloke2007
Reviews.Content: wife stayed bank holiday weekend hotel reviews suggest location stones clean breakfast plentiful overall considered value reception doesnt deserve negative comments found staff friendly helpful maps tourist info etc stay

Reviews.Title: “The only good comments must be from the owner trying to improve rating”
Reviews.Author: DrDector
Reviews.Content: owner rude person met literally kicked 1145 poorly maintained noisy dirty hotel risk hazard crack dangerous stairs owner couple lucky trust dont stay
